00212 #define hwloc_cpuset_foreach_begin(cpu, set) \
00213 do { \
00214         for (cpu = hwloc_cpuset_first(set); \
00215              cpu != (__typeof__(cpu)) -1; \
00216              cpu = hwloc_cpuset_next(set, cpu)) { \
00217 
00221 #define hwloc_cpuset_foreach_end() \
00222         } \
00223 } while (0)
